byline.original: By BEN STRAUSS and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

abstract: Major League Baseball and the players’ union announce Tampa Bay Rays will play Cuban national team in exhibition game in Havana, which Pres Obama will attend on his visit to country.
snippet: President Obama is expected to attend the game, which will be held March 22 at Estadio Latinoamericano....
lead_paragraph: President Obama is expected to attend the game, which will be held March 22 at Estadio Latinoamericano.

headline.main: Rays to Play Cuban National Team in Havana
headline.print_headline: Rays to Play Cuban National Team in an Exhibition Game in Havana
